Package charts

Class ChartController

  • java.lang.Object
    • charts.ChartController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IChartViewListener
    public class ChartController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IChartViewListener
    Represents the controller of a chart window according to the Model-View-Controller paradigm. ChartController implements IChartViewListener. Therefore, a chart controller instance listens for events the chart frame and its associated indicators- and alarms-dialogs produce in response to user actions and changes the chart model accordingly.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ChartController​(ChartModel chartModel)
      Instantiates a new chart controller and associates it with a chart model.

      • indicatorsDialogOKButtonClicked

        public void indicatorsDialogOKButtonClicked​(java.util.List<Indicator> indicators)
        Called when the user clicks the "OK" button in the indicators dialog. Adds the specified indicators to the chart model.
        Parameters:
        indicators - the list of indicators specified in the indicators dialog where the "OK" button is clicked

        Specified by:
        showAlarmsDialog in interface IChartViewListener
        Parameters:
        chartPanel - the chart panel that will draw the alarm lines
        stock - the stock for which alarm prices will be set in the dialog
